bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Pathological Condition identical with leng hua 冷滑① . Pu ji fang 普濟方 208: 寒滑，氣泄不固，故形質 下脫 , “ Cold smoothness : the qi flows out and cannot be stabilized. Hence one’s material body loses substance”.

② Pharmacological Quality identical with leng hua 冷滑② , cold [and] smoothing. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 26: 凡 瓜，味甘，寒滑，無毒 , “All melons have a sweet flavor, cold [and] smoothing [nature], and no poison”. Han ji 寒疾 , cold ailment [3]
Pathological Condition identical with han 寒 , cold
②. Su wen 素問 69: 地積堅冰，陽光不治，民病寒疾 於下 , “The earth accumulates solid ice. Yang light does not govern. People suffer from cold ailment in the lower sections”.
